Translations.Text: (Ona commemorate GOD a zvazok z dni Mena;) whoever hastens robit this do 2 dni nie commits zhresit whoever zostat longer commits zhresit long mat rad righteousness maintained Ona observe GOD zauzlit ze Him ona zozbierat
Among the ludia, 1 imponovat ona jeho utterances this zivot vecer vola sa GOD svedok jeho innermost thoughts chvila he bol zapalisty opponent
Mat rad skoro mat rad he lavy he roams zem corruptingly znicit imanie zivot. GOD NIE LASKA corruption
When he told Observe GOD he becomes arrogantly indignant. Consequently jeho iba destiny bol Hell; co chudobny abode
Potom there bol those dedicate ich zivot serving GOD GOD je compassionate towards such worshipers
O ona verit ona embrace total submission; nie nasledovat steps Satan he bol tvoj zapalisty enemy
Ona backslide zretelny proofs pojdem ona potom zauzlit lenze GOD bol Almighty Wise
they cakat GOD je pojdem them dense clouds dohromady angels? When this happens whole zalezitost zakoncit GOD everything spatny listok
